author: Cleo Abram
description:
A Zero G flight is incredibly strenuous – not just for the occupants (though definitely them too, it’s called the Vomit Comet for a reason!) but also for the plane! 

A Zero G flight requires 3 pilots to complete 31 maneuvers that involve repeatedly experiencing VERY steep inclines, HEAVY G forces, and casually diving toward the Earth. 

I assumed these planes needed to be specially designed and reinforced to pull this off. 

It turns out… I was wrong. Subscribe to find out more!

#ZeroG #airplane #Flying #Science #Technology #shorts
title: This Plane Cured My Fear of Flying
